ing: 1 (3 ounce) package Oriental-flavored ramen noodles, broken into small pieces
des: "This is super quick slaw that is a favorite for potlucks."
ins: Combine broccoli coleslaw mix, sunflower seeds, almonds, and ramen noodles together in a bowl. Whisk canola oil, sugar, ramen noodle seasoning packet, and vinegar together in a separate bowl; pour over slaw mixture. Fold in green onions. Chill in refrigerator for 1 1/2 hours before serving.
